summary: A SweetFX preset that makes your Skyrim look alot more realistic, with hitting your performance!
descriptionHtml:
This is a preset for SweetFX 1.5 and it is for all of you who want skyrim to look alot more realistic. And without having to use a performance heavy ENB mod! I can guarantee that most of you won't notice any drop in FPS when using this!

The title says "Lightheads Realistic Lighting - SweetFX". I am Lighthead (or MrLighthead, if you please). This is a Nexus account I made some time ago and I just didn't use that name when I created it back then.


Installation:
1. Download the file manually.
2. Extract all the files from the archive.
3. Add all the files that you extracted to your Skyrim folder where your executable is located (should be in --> steam/steamapps/common/skyrim)
4. Done! Enjoy! :)

Uninstallation:
1. Delete all the files from your Skyrim folder that you added there when installing SweetFX.

They should be:
SweetFX (folder)
d3d9.dll
d3d9.fx
dxgi.dll
dxgi.fx
injector.ini
log.log
shader.fx
SweetFX readme.txt
SweetFX_preset.txt
SweetFX_settings.txt

2. Done!

More information about SweetFX and the original download can be found here: http://www.guru3d.com/files_details/sweetfx_shader_suite_download.html

and here

http://forums.guru3d.com/showthread.php?t=368880


There are also good tutorials for those of you who are new to SweetFX and want to learn more on youtube!


Thanks to CeeJay.dk for creating SweetFX!
author: godyzz aka MrLighthead
